review: We lost our Roku in a move and this was a great replacement! So user-friendly.  I love that you just plug in the stick and can use it with any smart tv! We plan to use it for our play room for cartoons and avoid paying another cable fee! Thanks Amazon!
author: NapaMommy

review: This is my favorite purchase of the year. I was so excited to get rid of my cable and just use Netflix streaming and Hulu. Having a prime membership and being able to watch some stuff for free, ended up being an even bigger bonus. Add in the music for when I'm cleaning and the games my kids can play..LOVE it!
author: Tonya Tamm

review: I like it, but there are quite a few things I was looking for that I thought would be on the gadget but weren't. Or at least I thought the gadget would allow for the download of some of those stuffs. I wish this either had a web browser or allows for it to be downloaded. I also wish, and would love to see it have the Udemy app, the Xfinity app, among others. This gadget would be perfect, I think, with those things available. You know what am saying...?
author: Lamarana

review: Very happy with this. Well worth the cost.
author: J. Kyler

review: I was excited to purchase this product for use since not all TVs are "Smart" in my household. I chose this over the Google Chromecast because it allows me to use Amazon's Instant Video. However, although the setup and use is easy, I was disappointed in the false advertisement. We are "supposed" to be able to fling what is playing off our devices/tablets.. however the fling option is only available from Amazon devices. This was not disclosed in their sales pitch. It may be found in small fine print. I've tried contacting Amazon regarding this matter and all they could recommend was for me to speak with one of their technicians to troubleshoot, which I know is not the problem.
author: Sherry

review: I am very pleased because I bought two more and will buy one more later. It is more than expected and easy to set up.. Also bought a game controller with easy setup. I'm happy.
author: Harold Lauderdale

review: This product works as advertised and is easy to set up and use.  I like the size of the remote and the fact that the unit does not take up a lot of room.  I use it for both NetFlix and Amazon Prime.  I particualrly like the fact that it connects with the HDMI stick which makes connection really easy.  A lot less wire than with Roku.  I would not hesitate to buy this item
author: nana

review: Very pleasantly surprised and very happy with the ease of connecting and operating the device.  Love it!!
